com.robopupu.api.util

Class StringToolkit

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.robopupu.api.util.StringToolkit

  • public class StringToolkit
extends java.lang.Object
    StringToolkit provides a set of convenience methods and utilities for using and modifying Strings.

      • equals

        public static boolean equals(char[] chars,
                             int length,
                             java.lang.String string)
        Tests if the given char array equals with the given String.
        Parameters:
        chars - The given char array.
        length - The number of characters to be compared. Should not exceed the length of the char array.
        string - The given String. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        A boolean value true if the char array and the String contain the same characters.

        Parameters:
        chars - The given char array.
        offset - The offset for the char array.
        length - The number of characters to be compared. Should not exceed the length of the char array.
        string - The given String. Cannot be null.
        Returns:
        true if the char array and the String contain the same characters.

        tokensString - The given tokens String.
        separator - The specified separator String.
        tokens - A List used for storing the parsed tokens.
